scripts.sass: node-sass --include-path scss sass/main.scss public/css/main.css --output-style expanded && node-sass --include-path scss sass/main.scss public/css/main.min.css --output-style compressed && autoprefixer-cli -o public/css/main.css public/css/main.css && autoprefixer-cli -o public/css/main.min.css public/css/main.min.css
